gobblin.example.simplejson

Class SimpleJsonConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<SI,Schema,DI,GenericRecord>
      • gobblin.converter.ToAvroConverterBase<String,String>
        • gobblin.example.simplejson.SimpleJsonConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class SimpleJsonConverter
extends ToAvroConverterBase<String,String>
    An implementation of Converter for the simple JSON example.

    This converter converts the input string schema into an Avro Schema and each input json document into an Avro GenericRecord.
